message.en: Our [color=#ee8695]host[/color]... your absence has damaged them.

message.en: In any case, the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] has forgotten that they are, {p=0.2}in fact{p=0.2}, not an [color=#fbbbad]island[/color].

message.en: People are social; friends and family heal all wounds. The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] needs them.

message.en: Memories. They shine through to the [color=#ee8695]host[/color], absolving them of bitterness and sorrow.
